DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the treatment efficacy between vertebral body decompression procedure and vertebroplasty with non-inferiority design
DOC.brief_title: The Comparative Study About the Effect of Vertebral Body Decompression Procedure
DOC.criteria: osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture malignancy or inflammatory disease severe pain in other joints coagulopathy an inappropriate person considered by investigator
